mapper.select: SELECT mem.member_name, cr.room_id, cr.member_id, ch.sender, ch.content FROM chatroom cr JOIN members mem ON cr.member_id = mem.member_id JOIN chat ch ON cr.room_id = ch.room_id WHERE cr.maker_member_id = #{sId} AND ch.chat_idx = (SELECT max(chat_idx) FROM chat WHERE room_id = cr.room_id) ORDER BY ch.chat_idx DESC LIMIT #{startRow} ,#{listLimit}
